problem_text_cn: 如图,将△ABC沿直线DE折叠后,使点B与点A重合,已知AC=5cm,△ADC的周长为14cm,则BC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, after folding △ABC along the straight line DE, make point B coincide with point A, it is known that AC = N_0, the perimeter of △ADC is N_1, then the length of BC is ()
raw_answer: 根据折叠可得:AD=BD,∵△ADC的周长为14cm,AC=5cm,∴AD+DC=14-5=9(cm),∵AD=BD,∴BC=BD+CD=9cm.故选B
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了翻折变换,关键是掌握折叠是一种对称变换,它属于轴对称,折叠前后图形的形状和大小不变,位置变化,对应边和对应角相等.
